channel.title: Need serious help
channel.description: I really need help with my server i just downloaded the newest jdk (1.6.0) but when i try the compile i get an error i already changed my compile.bat:@echo off color 8 title Testscape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java JAVA -Xmx512m server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" server pause but i still get an error i cant run my server also i changed it to:echo off title TestScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server but i still doesnt work the one who help me with this becomes an admin on my server!

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @HackRs HackRs
item.description:
@HackRs wrote:

I really need help with my server i just downloaded the newest jdk (1.6.0) but when i try the compile i get an error i already changed my compile.bat:@echo off
color 8
title Testscape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
JAVA -Xmx512m server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” server
pause
but i still get an error i cant run my server also i changed it to:echo off
title TestScape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
but i still doesnt work the one who help me with this becomes an admin on my server!

Read full topic
